summary: A website for Sameer Medical, a pharmacy in Shahabad, Karnataka, India. The site helps customers browse and learn about the store's products and services. Store details: phone 0000999988, hours Mon-Sun 10am-3pm and 6pm-10pm.

existing_features.title: Build a multi-section landing page that includes a hero banner, an 'About Us' section with store info (address, hours, contact), a product categories grid, a featured products section, and a footer with contact details.
Implement a product listing page where customers can browse all products, filter by category, and search by product name.

Apply a clean, professional medical theme: white and mint-green primary palette with cool gray accents, sans-serif typography, generous whitespace, and subtle card shadows. Use a cross/medical icon motif in the branding. Enforce this style consistently across all pages.
Generate and display a hero banner image for the medical store website and a store logo featuring a medical cross motif.
Update the pharmacy name to 'Sameer Medical' everywhere it appears across the frontend (Header, HeroSection, AboutUsSection, Footer, and any other components or pages).

Update all frontend components that display store contact info and hours (HeroSection, AboutUsSection, Footer) to show the phone number '0000999988', hours 'Mon-Sun: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM', and location 'Shahabad, Karnataka, India', using data from the backend store info query or updated fallback defaults.

new_feature_requests.summary: Medical store website with product listings and store info

Create a backend actor that stores and serves medical store data including: store info (name, address, phone, hours), product categories, and individual product listings (name, description, price, category, availability status).

Update the backend store info to set the pharmacy name to 'Sameer Medical', phone number to '0000999988', operating hours to 'Mon-Sun: 10:00 AM – 3:00 PM & 6:00 PM – 10:00 PM', and address/city to 'Shahabad, Karnataka, India'.
